conversation_history.content: Act as if you are the human user of an AI application, and I am your AI assistant. Please prompt me with one clear, super short sentence in colloquial language, without greetings or compliments!

ReelTV is a content creation powerhouse that ingests any YouTube video and automatically crafts attention-grabbing reels scripts ready for TikTok, Instagram, and beyond.   Example Queries  “Turn https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ into a 15-second highlight reel with captions.”  “Make a TikTok from this cooking tutorial that starts with the most mouth-watering moment.”  “Create a 20 sec motivational reel from this keynote, with on-screen quotes and upbeat transitions.”
How do I give ReelTV the link to a YouTube video I want to turn into a highlight reel?
Can you make this ReelTV data into a script for TikTok, adjusting the audio levels so its more audible on mobile devices?
Change the first text overlay from The Power of Entrepreneurship to just Power of Entrepreneurship, and add a shorter font size and make the font color black instead of white!
How do I remove the background music for this reel, so that it starts completely silent?
